symptoms.name: headache
symptoms.definition: Pain in the head, often caused by tension, dehydration, or eyestrain.
symptoms.advice: Rest, hydration, OTC pain relievers (ibuprofen, acetaminophen). Seek help if severe or persistent.

symptoms.name: migraine
symptoms.definition: Severe, recurring headache often with nausea, light sensitivity, or aura.
symptoms.advice: Dark, quiet environment. OTC meds (aspirin, naproxen). Prescription triptans for frequent migraines.

symptoms.name: fever
symptoms.advice: Adults: seek care if >103°F (39.4°C) or lasting >3 days.

symptoms.name: child fever
symptoms.advice: Infants <3 months with 100.4°F (38°C) need immediate care. Older kids: monitor hydration.

symptoms.name: cough
symptoms.definition: Sudden expulsion of air to clear throat/lungs.
symptoms.advice: Honey or cough drops may help. See doctor if lasts >3 weeks or with bloody phlegm.

symptoms.name: dry cough
symptoms.advice: Humidifiers and lozenges may help. Persistent cough needs evaluation.

symptoms.name: sore throat
symptoms.definition: Pain or irritation in the throat.
symptoms.advice: Gargle warm salt water, use throat lozenges. See doctor if severe pain or lasts >1 week.

symptoms.name: strep throat
symptoms.advice: Requires antibiotics. Needs throat swab test.

symptoms.name: runny nose
symptoms.advice: Antihistamines help allergies. Saline spray may relieve congestion.

symptoms.name: nasal congestion
symptoms.advice: Steam inhalation, decongestants (short-term). Chronic congestion needs evaluation.

symptoms.name: sinus pain
symptoms.definition: Pressure or pain in sinus cavities.
symptoms.advice: Warm compresses, hydration, decongestants. See doctor if severe pain or lasts >10 days.

symptoms.name: ear pain
symptoms.advice: Warm compress may help. Children often need evaluation for ear infections.

symptoms.name: toothache
symptoms.definition: Pain in or around a tooth.
symptoms.advice: Rinse with warm salt water. See dentist ASAP for persistent pain or swelling.

symptoms.name: heartburn
symptoms.definition: Burning sensation in chest from acid reflux.
symptoms.advice: Avoid trigger foods. Antacids may help. Frequent heartburn (2+/week) needs evaluation.

symptoms.name: indigestion
symptoms.definition: Discomfort in upper abdomen after eating.
symptoms.advice: Eat smaller meals. Avoid late-night eating. Persistent symptoms may indicate GERD.

symptoms.name: nausea
symptoms.advice: Sip clear fluids, try ginger. Seek care if persistent or with severe pain/vomiting.

symptoms.name: vomiting
symptoms.advice: Stay hydrated with small sips of clear fluids. Seek care if lasts >24h or dehydration signs.

symptoms.name: diarrhea
symptoms.advice: BRAT diet (bananas, rice, applesauce, toast). Seek care if bloody or lasts >2 days.

symptoms.name: constipation
symptoms.advice: Increase fiber/water intake. Mild laxatives may help. Chronic constipation needs evaluation.

symptoms.name: stomach pain
symptoms.advice: For mild cases, try heat pad and rest. Seek care for severe pain, vomiting, or lasting >24h.

symptoms.name: food poisoning
symptoms.advice: Rest and hydration are key. Seek care if bloody diarrhea, high fever, or dehydration signs.

symptoms.name: back pain
symptoms.definition: Discomfort in the upper, middle, or lower back.
symptoms.advice: Ice/heat therapy, gentle stretches. Seek care if radiates down legs or causes weakness.

symptoms.name: neck pain
symptoms.definition: Discomfort in the cervical spine area.
symptoms.advice: Gentle stretches, good posture. See doctor if pain radiates to arms or causes numbness.

symptoms.name: muscle pain
symptoms.advice: Rest, ice, OTC pain relievers. Seek care if severe or with swelling/discoloration.

symptoms.name: joint pain
symptoms.definition: Discomfort where bones meet (knees, hips, etc.).
symptoms.advice: RICE method (Rest, Ice, Compression, Elevation). Persistent pain needs evaluation.

symptoms.name: knee pain
symptoms.definition: Pain in or around the knee joint.
symptoms.advice: Rest, ice, and OTC anti-inflammatories may help. Seek care for swelling, locking, or instability.

symptoms.name: ankle pain
symptoms.advice: RICE method. Seek care if unable to bear weight or with significant swelling.

symptoms.name: wrist pain
symptoms.advice: Rest and splinting may help. Repetitive strain may need ergonomic adjustments.

symptoms.name: shoulder pain
symptoms.advice: Rest and gentle stretches. Seek care if unable to move arm or with severe pain.

symptoms.name: arthritis symptoms
symptoms.advice: Treatment includes meds, exercise, and sometimes surgery.

symptoms.name: allergy symptoms
symptoms.advice: Antihistamines and nasal steroids help. See allergist for severe cases.

symptoms.name: asthma symptoms
symptoms.advice: Use prescribed inhalers. Seek emergency care for severe attacks.

symptoms.name: high blood pressure
symptoms.definition: Elevated force of blood against artery walls (>130/80 mmHg).
symptoms.advice: Lifestyle changes (diet/exercise) help. May need medication.

symptoms.name: low blood pressure
symptoms.advice: Increase fluid/salt intake if approved by doctor. Stand up slowly.

symptoms.name: cholesterol
symptoms.definition: Waxy substance in blood (LDL = bad, HDL = good).
symptoms.advice: Diet low in saturated fats helps. Exercise and medications may be needed.

symptoms.name: diabetes symptoms
symptoms.advice: Requires blood testing for diagnosis. Manage with diet, exercise, and/or insulin.

symptoms.name: low blood sugar
symptoms.advice: Consume 15g fast-acting carbs (juice, glucose tabs). Recheck in 15 minutes.

symptoms.name: thyroid problems
symptoms.advice: Blood tests needed for diagnosis. Treatment varies (medication, surgery).

symptoms.name: anemia symptoms
symptoms.advice: Blood tests determine cause and treatment (iron supplements, dietary changes).

symptoms.name: depression symptoms
symptoms.advice: Counseling and/or medication can help. Seek professional support.

symptoms.name: anxiety symptoms
symptoms.advice: Therapy and relaxation techniques help. Medication may be needed.

symptoms.name: insomnia
symptoms.advice: Good sleep hygiene helps. Avoid screens before bed. Chronic insomnia may need evaluation.

symptoms.name: fatigue
symptoms.definition: Persistent tiredness or lack of energy.
symptoms.advice: Ensure adequate sleep, nutrition, hydration. Persistent fatigue needs medical evaluation.

symptoms.name: dizziness
symptoms.advice: Sit/lie down when dizzy. Hydrate. Seek care if recurrent or with neurological symptoms.

symptoms.name: vertigo
symptoms.advice: Specific maneuvers (Epley) can help. See doctor for recurrent episodes.

symptoms.name: head injury
symptoms.advice: Seek immediate care for loss of consciousness, confusion, or worsening symptoms.

symptoms.name: sunburn
symptoms.advice: Cool compresses, aloe vera, hydration. Seek care for blistering or fever.

symptoms.name: rash
symptoms.advice: Keep clean/dry. Hydrocortisone cream for itch. Seek care if widespread or with fever.

symptoms.name: hives
symptoms.advice: Antihistamines help. Seek care if with swelling of face/lips or breathing difficulty.

symptoms.name: poison ivy
symptoms.advice: Wash area, use calamine lotion. Oral antihistamines help itching. Severe cases may need steroids.

symptoms.name: burn treatment
symptoms.advice: Cool water (not ice), cover loosely. Seek care for large burns or on face/hands/genitals.

symptoms.name: cut treatment
symptoms.advice: Clean with water, apply pressure for bleeding. Seek care for deep wounds or signs of infection.

symptoms.name: sprain
symptoms.advice: RICE method (Rest, Ice, Compression, Elevation). Seek care if unable to bear weight.

symptoms.name: strain
symptoms.advice: Rest, ice, gentle stretching. OTC pain relievers may help.

symptoms.name: pink eye
symptoms.advice: Warm compresses help. Viral cases resolve in 1-2 weeks. Bacterial needs antibiotic drops.

symptoms.name: stye
symptoms.advice: Warm compresses 4x/day. Usually resolves in 1-2 weeks. See doctor if persistent.

symptoms.name: vision changes
symptoms.advice: Sudden changes need immediate evaluation. Gradual changes need eye exam.

symptoms.name: urinary pain
symptoms.advice: May indicate UTI. Increased fluids help. See doctor for testing/treatment.

symptoms.name: frequent urination
examples: waking up at night to pee
symptoms.advice: May indicate UTI, diabetes, or other conditions. Needs evaluation.

symptoms.name: menstrual cramps
symptoms.advice: Heat, OTC pain relievers, exercise may help. Severe pain needs evaluation.

symptoms.name: pregnancy symptoms
symptoms.advice: Home tests detect hCG hormone. Confirm with doctor.

symptoms.name: morning sickness
symptoms.advice: Small frequent meals, ginger may help. Severe cases need medical attention.

symptoms.name: breast pain
symptoms.advice: Often hormonal. See doctor for lumps, skin changes, or persistent pain.

symptoms.name: erectile dysfunction
symptoms.advice: May indicate vascular issues. Lifestyle changes and medications can help.

symptoms.name: STD symptoms
symptoms.advice: Vary by infection. Testing needed for diagnosis. Many are treatable.

symptoms.name: cold sores
symptoms.definition: Blisters caused by herpes simplex virus.
symptoms.advice: Antiviral creams may help. Avoid touching/spreading. Usually resolve in 7-10 days.

symptoms.name: athlete's foot
symptoms.advice: Antifungal creams/sprays. Keep feet dry. May take 4 weeks to clear.

symptoms.name: ringworm
symptoms.advice: Antifungal creams. Keep area dry. See doctor if widespread or not improving.

symptoms.name: flu symptoms
symptoms.advice: Rest and fluids are key. Antivirals may help if started early.

symptoms.name: cold symptoms
symptoms.advice: Rest and fluids help. Usually resolves in 7-10 days.

symptoms.name: COVID symptoms
symptoms.advice: Testing needed for diagnosis. Isolate if positive.

symptoms.name: vaccine side effects
symptoms.advice: Mild fever, soreness common. Serious reactions rare. Report severe symptoms.

symptoms.name: smoking cessation
symptoms.advice: Nicotine replacement, medications, counseling can help. Quitting has immediate benefits.

symptoms.name: weight loss
symptoms.advice: Healthy diet and exercise. Unexplained weight loss needs medical evaluation.

symptoms.name: healthy diet
symptoms.advice: Focus on fruits, vegetables, whole grains, lean proteins. Limit processed foods.

symptoms.name: exercise benefits
symptoms.advice: 30 minutes daily improves cardiovascular health, mood, and longevity.

symptoms.name: stress management
symptoms.advice: Exercise, meditation, adequate sleep help. Chronic stress needs attention.

symptoms.name: high cholesterol diet
symptoms.advice: Limit saturated/trans fats. Increase fiber. Fish and nuts may help.

symptoms.name: heart healthy diet
symptoms.advice: Focus on vegetables, whole grains, lean proteins. Limit salt and saturated fats.

symptoms.name: diabetic diet
symptoms.definition: Meal plan to manage blood sugar.
symptoms.advice: Balance carbohydrates. Focus on fiber-rich foods. Regular meal timing helps.

symptoms.name: blood pressure diet
symptoms.advice: DASH diet helps: fruits, vegetables, low-fat dairy, reduced sodium.

symptoms.name: prenatal vitamins
symptoms.advice: Contain folic acid, iron, calcium. Important before/during pregnancy.

symptoms.name: vitamin D
symptoms.advice: Sunlight exposure helps. Supplements may be needed, especially in winter.

symptoms.name: probiotics
symptoms.advice: May help gut health. Found in yogurt, supplements. Effects vary by strain.

symptoms.name: hydration
symptoms.advice: Aim for 8 glasses water daily. More needed with exercise/heat.

symptoms.name: sleep hygiene
symptoms.advice: Regular schedule, dark/quiet room, limit screens before bed.

symptoms.name: sun protection
symptoms.advice: SPF 30+, reapply every 2 hours. Seek shade 10am-4pm.

symptoms.name: tick bite
symptoms.definition: Bite from a tick (Lyme disease risk).
symptoms.advice: Remove with tweezers, clean area. Watch for rash/fever (Lyme disease signs).

symptoms.name: animal bite
symptoms.advice: Clean thoroughly. Seek care for deep wounds or unknown animal vaccination status.

symptoms.name: first aid kit
symptoms.advice: Should include bandages, gauze, antiseptic, gloves, pain relievers, etc.
